scripts.run-chromium: node src/main.js --width 1024 --height 600 --metrics ./example/metrics-cpu.yaml,./example/metrics-http.yaml --prometheus https://prometheus.demo.do.prometheus.io --since 7d --backend chromium --renderer canvas --output ./example --headless true
scripts.run-nodecanvas_svg: node src/main.js --width 1024 --height 600 --metrics ./example/metrics-cpu.yaml --prometheus https://prometheus.demo.do.prometheus.io --since 1d --backend chromium --renderer svg --output ./example --headless true
scripts.run-nodecanvas_png: node src/main.js --width 1024 --height 600 --showLegend false --metrics ./example/metrics-cpu.yaml --prometheus https://prometheus.demo.do.prometheus.io --since 1d --backend chromium --renderer canvas --output ./example --headless true
scripts.run-chromium-istio: node src/main.js --width 1024 --showLegend false --height 600 --metrics ./example/metrics-istio.yaml --prometheus http://k8s.imlc.tech:30649 --since 15m --renderer canvas --backend chromium --output ./example --headless true
